nodes.documentation:

@param _from The address to check against if the transfer is allowed.
nodes.name: canTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function enables token transfers for everyone.
Can only be enabled after the end of the ICO.
nodes.name: releaseTokenForTransfer

nodes.documentation: @notice This function disables token transfers for everyone.
nodes.name: disableTokenTransfers
